title: Unable to register security provider
body:
### Describe the bug

I am unable to register a security provider (BouncyCastle) when following the instructions here:
https://quarkus.io/guides/security-customization#registering-security-providers

### Expected behavior

The BouncyCastle JCE provider will be recognized after registering it in application.properties and as a Maven dependency

### Actual behavior

I see the following warning in the logs at application startup:

`09:53:44 WARN  [io.quarkus.config] Unrecognized configuration key "quarkus.security.security-providers" was provided; it will be ignored; verify that the dependency extension for this configuration is set or that you did not make a typo
`


### How to Reproduce?

1.  Add a line saying "quarkus.security.security-providers=BC" to my application.properties file
2. Add BouncyCastle libs as a Maven dependency
3. Start application

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Darwin nakhlas-471.local 23.2.0 Darwin Kernel Version 23.2.0: Wed Nov 15 21:54:10 PST 2023; root:xnu-10002.61.3~2/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "17.0.7" 2023-04-18 OpenJDK Runtime Environment Temurin-17.0.7+7 (build 17.0.7+7) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Temurin-17.0.7+7 (build 17.0.7+7, mixed mode, sharing)

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.6.6

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.9.5 (57804ffe001d7215b5e7bcb531cf83df38f93546)

### Additional information

_No response_
